00070 class SIM_API cDensityEstBase : public cStdDev
00071 {
00072   public:
00076     enum {
00077         RANGE_AUTO,      // automatic range setup, using precollected values and range extension (the default)
00078         RANGE_AUTOLOWER, // like RANGE_AUTO, but upper limit is fixed
00079         RANGE_AUTOUPPER, // like RANGE_AUTO, but lower limit is fixed
00080         RANGE_FIXED,     // fixed range (lower, upper)
00081         RANGE_NOTSET     // not set, but it is OK (cVarHistogram only)
00082     };
00083 
00089     struct Cell
00090     {
00091         double lower;  // lower cell bound (inclusive)
00092         double upper;  // lower cell bound (exclusive)
00093         double value;  // counter (or its estimate)
00094         double relativeFreq;  // value / total
00095         Cell() {lower=upper=value=relativeFreq=0;}
00096     };
00097 
00098   protected:
00099     double rangemin, rangemax;   // range for distribution density collection
00100     int num_firstvals;         // number of "pre-collected" observations
00101                                 // before transform() is performed.
00102     unsigned long cell_under;
00103     unsigned long cell_over;    // for counting observations that fall out of range
00104 
00105     double range_ext_factor;    // the range of histogram is: [min_vals, max_vals] made
00106                                 // range_ext_factor times larger
00107     int range_mode;             // one of RANGE_xxx constants
00108 
00109     bool transfd;
00110     double *firstvals;         // pointer to array of "pre-collected" observations
00111 
00112   protected:
00113     static void plotline (std::ostream& os, const char *pref, double xval, double count, double a);
00114 
00115     // part of merge(); to be implemented in subclasses
00116     virtual void doMergeCellValues(const cDensityEstBase *other) = 0;
00117   public:
00118     // internal, for use in sim_std.msg; note: each call overwrites the previous value!
00119     const Cell& internalGetCellInfo(int k) const;
00120 
00121   public:
00124 
00128     cDensityEstBase(const cDensityEstBase& r) : cStdDev()
00129             {setName(r.getName());firstvals=NULL;operator=(r);}
00130 
00134     explicit cDensityEstBase(const char *name=NULL);
00135 
00139     virtual ~cDensityEstBase();
00140 
00144     cDensityEstBase& operator=(const cDensityEstBase& res);
00146 
00149 
00150     /* No dup() because this is an abstract class. */
00151 
00155     virtual std::string detailedInfo() const;
00156 
00162     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00163 
00169     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00171 
00174 
00182     virtual void collect(double value);
00183 
00187     virtual void collect(SimTime value) {collect(value.dbl());}
00188 
00195     virtual void merge(const cStatistic *other);
00196 
00200     virtual void clearResult();
00201 
00205     virtual void saveToFile(FILE *) const;
00206 
00210     virtual void loadFromFile(FILE *);
00212 
00215 
00220     virtual void setRange(double lower, double upper);
00221 
00233     virtual void setRangeAuto(int num_firstvals=100, double range_ext_fact=2.0);
00234 
00242     virtual void setRangeAutoLower(double upper, int num_firstvals=100, double range_ext_fact=2.0);
00243 
00251     virtual void setRangeAutoUpper(double lower, int num_firstvals=100, double range_ext_fact=2.0);
00252 
00257     virtual void setNumFirstVals(int num_firstvals);
00258 
00263     virtual int getNumFirstVals() const {return num_firstvals;}
00264 
00269     virtual double getRangeExtensionFactor() const {return range_ext_factor;}
00271 
00272   protected:
00279     virtual void setupRange();
00280 
00287     virtual void collectTransformed(double value) = 0;
00288 
00289   public:
00290 
00293 
00297     virtual bool isTransformed() const   {return transfd;}
00298 
00305     virtual void transform() = 0;
00307 
00310 
00315     virtual int getNumCells() const = 0;
00316 
00324     virtual double getBasepoint(int k) const = 0;
00325 
00331     virtual double getCellValue(int k) const = 0;
00332 
00340     virtual double getCellPDF(int k) const;
00341 
00346     virtual unsigned long getUnderflowCell() const {return cell_under;}
00347 
00352     virtual unsigned long getOverflowCell() const {return cell_over;}
00353 
00358     virtual Cell getCellInfo(int k) const;
00360 
00363 
00369     virtual double getPDF(double x) const = 0;
00370 
00376     virtual double getCDF(double x) const = 0;
00378 };
